tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  AMAZING LECTURES  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: I would defiantly recommend anyone who plans on taking general biology 1 or 2 to sign up for his lecture class. He\'s very invested in the material and in helping you understand it. He\'s extremely helpful, funny, and caring. Literally everything that he covers in lecture will be on the exams so I barely used the book. Only 1 group project. Great guy

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Such a sweet and genuine guy. Never had such a caring and helpful professor. Literally gives you a study guide, offers review sessions, and readily answers any questions. Classwork makes lecture 10x better, and its obvious he loves his job.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: By far the best professor I had freshman year. He was super helpful in and outside of class. If someone didn\'t understand something, he was more than willing to go back over it. His tests were very fair, but not too difficult. Just study your notes and read the textbook and you will be fine. I wish I could take this class again! Highly recommend!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr. Harbison is a great guy. He is very passionate and is always willing to help. Go to his office hours! Some of the lectures can be boring but he hands out a lot of worksheets to help move lecture along. The tests are challenging but if you study hard you will be fine. I would definitely take him again!!!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Super helpful in office hours always very approachable. He is very clear in his lectures and enthusiastic. Just study and you will do fine.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: His test are incredibly hard. He really tries to connect with college students with jokes and movies. I would not recommend him if you don\'t want to put work in for studying lot. Barely any homework. One group project. It was a very tedious time consuming class. Take at will.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Not the clearest teacher, but if you pay attention and put a lot of effort, you\'ll do fine. He\'s the sweetest man alive, and really tries his hardest to help you understand the subject. His lectures are interesting. His test questions are very "outside the box". You need to know how to apply what he teaches into real world situations.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Very nice, however he is so boring. The only time he gets excited is when he talks about birds. I would say that his tests are hard and he gives little to no direction on what will be on it.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr. Harbison is a great lab professor. I haven\'t had him for lecture but in lab he is very helpful and approachable. He doesn\'t grade hard either. Take him.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr. Harbison is one of the best professors at Siena College. He is extremely passionate and that makes learning the information interesting. Fair tests and fair assignments. You have to study for every bio class and this is no exception. I recommend him to any student.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: this man is an uncoordinated clown. People like him because he acts nice and his tests are sort of easy but his lab is a mess, his assignments are disorganized and he anticipates an inordinate interest in some ludicrous hobby from every student.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Great guy, very helpful. HARD GRADER. if you do not like biology and are not good at it, don\'t take him. Hes extremely helpful during lab, but his quizzes are really hard, and he is often very picky about answers. But, he does really love what he is talking about and really tries to explain the material.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr. Harbison is the best Biology teacher, his classes are fun and interesting and he tries to keep the class involved. His tests can be a little difficult but if you study and go to the review sessions you\'ll do fine. He is always willing to help and his quizzes and homework assignments are not bad and will help bring up your grade.

comments: had him for 110 and 120. LOVE HIM! hes very enthusiastic and is really good at explaining the material. he tries to understand an answer questions and makes and effort to help you out. everyone says his tests are hard but REALLY study your notes and you\'ll be okay.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: loved going to his class and wish i could have taken him for another semester. he is extremely enthusiastic about bio and its great. some of his tests are a little difficult but if you dont mind a challenge and want to be interested during class i would definitely recommend that you take him. great guy!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: His enthusiasm is adorable. His research is tied in to almost all of his lectures, but it\'s very interesting. If you\'re up for a small challenge, take him. If not, find someone else.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: His classes aren\'t bad it\'s his tests that are impossible. It doesn\'t matter how much you think you know the subject, he still throws in ridiculous questions and he didn\'t tell us which are "multiple choice" and which are "circle all" so how can we possibly get those questions right?? And that was on the final! Lab he\'s great, class not at all

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr. Harbison is a great guy, but a terrible teacher. His tests DO NOT follow the material he taught in class, or even a lot of the textbook for that matter. The class average on tests was never about a 70 ( and he still did not see anything wrong with that) Take him for lab, but not for class.. unless you don\'t mind a C
